page.title: 15CALLINGTON POLICE AUXILIARY
page.content: The{traffic warden}is based at the police station and is subject to the jurisdiction of the police. He patrols Callington on foot to ensure that traffic moves freely, especially important at summer holiday weekends when there is a marked increase in traffic through the area. He watches for illegal or illogical parking and issues parking tickets which may result in fines. There are 8{special {constables,}5 men and 3 women, recruited as volunteers to assist the paid members of the force. They work 4 hours a week,are supplied with a uniform and have an allowance for shoes.They assist an officer in making arrests and in general patrolling duties.
